name: "She Loves Me" Lyrics Quiz | She Loves Me | 25 Questions

questions.text: Who wrote the music for "She Loves Me"?
questions.explanation:
Jerry Bock.

	Jerry Bock also did the music for "Fiorello!"

questions.text: In "Good Morning, Good Day" who sings the line "What a perfect sample of summer weather."?
questions.explanation:
Georg.

	The workers are all contemplating skipping work today to have a picnic because the weather is so nice and they don't want to spend it inside. They finally come to the conclusion that, while a picnic and suntan are nice, it isn't worth losing their job.

questions.text:
Complete this lyric: 
Kodaly: "I would recommend a..." 
Sipos: "_______________________."
questions.explanation:
Bath today.

	"Sounds from Selling" shows what it sounds like with a lot of people shopping in a store all talking at once.

questions.text: The first time that "Thank You Madame" is sung, who of the following doesn't sing it?
questions.explanation:
Amalia.

	Everytime someone buys something and leaves the store they sing "Thank You Madame." The words are: "Thank you madame. Please call again. Do call again. Madame."

questions.text: Complete the lyric: "All night circling the _______"
questions.explanation:
floor.

	In "Days Go By" Maraczek is trying to teach Georg to dance as well as convince him to find one woman and settle down.

questions.text: Who does Amalia say the musical candy box is like the voice of?
questions.explanation:
God.

	Amalia sings in "No More Candy" "In a way it's a little like the voice of God."  If you were wondering about the choices. George Burns played God in the "O God" movies. Steve Martin played the dentist in the movie "Little Shop of Horrors".

questions.text: What book does Georg ask Amalia if she read in "Three Letters"?
questions.explanation:
War and Peace.

	"If it weren't for your endearing letters, I'd be flying south with all the geese. By the way, have you read "War and Peace?"

questions.text: What time is Georg supposed to meet his mystery woman according to one of the songs?
questions.explanation:
8.

	The song is called "Tonight at Eight" in which Georg tells Sipost how he's nervous about meeting this woman at eight.

questions.text: In "I Don't Know His Name" what does Ilona say perhaps she should get?
questions.explanation:
a library card.

	Ilona has trouble with men, and Amalia is talking about how Georg reads a lot of books so Ilona thinks perhaps she should go to the library to meet a good man.

questions.text: What are the last five words in "Perspective".
questions.explanation:
Do not lose your job.

	Sipost doesn't want Georg to quit because he's afraid that without Georg there, he will lose his job because he's a fool.

questions.text: What won't be the same without Georg?
questions.explanation:
Maraczek's.

	From the song "Goodbye Georg". "Goodbye Georg, Maraczek's won't be the same without you." This song is song after Georg quits his job.

questions.text: Complete the lyric from "Will He Like Me?" "Will he know there's a world of ________"?
questions.explanation:
love.

	Amalia is trying to figure out whether or not this man she's about to meet will like her when he meets her for real and not just through letters. She is very nervous.

questions.text: Who sings "Ilona"?
questions.explanation:
Kodaly.

	Kodaly has been cheating on Ilona and she dumped him when she found out. Kodaly decides to woo her and get her back by singing to her.

questions.text: Why does Ilona declare "I must be cousin to a cat" in the song "I Resolve"?
questions.correct: I always wind up with a rat
options: I want to get to the heavy side layer
questions.explanation:
I always wind up with a rat.

	In this song, Ilona Ritter decides that once and for all she's not gonna be used by men anymore. "I resolve not to be so stupid. It's high time, high time that I awoke."

questions.text: What does the head waiter call the other waiter in "Romantic Atmosphere"?
questions.explanation:
butter fingers.

	"Butter fingers do that again...that's the end of your career."

questions.text: Complete the lyrics from "Dear Friend" Charming, romantic the perfect __________"
questions.explanation:
café.

	Amalia is feeling depressed because "Dear Friend" never showed up. At least as far as she knows, because she doesn't realize that Georg was "Dear Friend".

questions.text: Who wrote the lyrics for "She Loves Me"?
questions.explanation:
Sheldon Harnick.

	Howard Dietz wrote the lyrics to "The Band Wagon". Don Black wrote the lyrics to "Billy" and Fred Ebb wrote the lyrics to "Chicago" and "Cabaret" among many other musicals that he worked on with John Kander.

questions.text: Which of these is the correct order of "every item in the store" that Arpod mentions in the song "Try Me"?
questions.correct: tube, jar, box, bottle, carton and container
options: box, carton, jar, tube, container and bottle
tube, jar, container, bottle, box and carton
bottle, box, carton, container, jar and tube
questions.explanation:
tube, jar, box, bottle, carton and container.

	"I have trained myself, going shelf by shelf and I know every item in the store. Every tube, jar, box, bottle, carton and container, where they are, what they cost, what they're for." Arpod is trying to convince Maraczek that he's good enough to become a sales clerk.

questions.text: Complete the title of this song "Where's My ______________?"
questions.explanation:
shoe.

	Amalia thinks Georg doesn't believe she's really sick so she's planning to go to work so he can't say anything. However, she can't find her shoe. Rather amusing too because she's frantically hunting for her shoe when she has a closet full of other shoes she could wear.

questions.text: What kind of ice cream did Georg bring Amalia?
questions.explanation:
vanilla.

	"Ice cream, he bought me ice cream, vanilla ice cream, and for the first time we were together without a spat."

questions.text: Compete the lyrics from the title song. "I'm freezing that's because _____________"
questions.explanation:
it's cold out.

	Georg realizes that Amalia loves him and that he loves her. He knows who she is, but she still doesn't realize who he is.

questions.text: In "Trip to the Library" what is the name of the optometrist that Ilona meets?
questions.explanation:
Paul.

	"I know he'll have eyes for me, my optometrist Paul."

questions.text: Complete the lyrics from "Grand Knowing You". "It's a small pleasure but I'll treasure each warm intimate __________."
questions.explanation:
snub.

	Kodaly has just been fired because the boss found out Kodaly has been having an affair with his wife. Kodaly sings "Grand Knowing You" to inform them all that he doesn't need them and one day they'll all be working for him.

questions.text: In "Twelve Days to Christmas" how many days are left when they sing about the people who are "Worst of all"?
questions.explanation:
4.

	"Loaded with gall...these are the people that shop in time and they're the worst of all."

questions.text: According to the finale how long did Georg know who "Dear friend" was?
questions.explanation:
2 weeks.

	"Two weeks, I"ve known for two weeks I wanted to tell you. I didn't dare. I thought you would have known, I hoped you would have guessed, in truth I couldn't wait another day." And there we have it folks, all the songs from "She Loves Me". I hope you enjoyed this quiz.
